main event: On July 31, 1954, a round, small, white object was observed over Mountain View, Missouri, moving towards the northwest after pausing for 10 seconds.
interesting points: The object was observed at a 45-degree elevation first and then at a 50-degree elevation when it departed., The duration of the sighting was 10 minutes., The object was seen after the local naval balloon was noted in the vicinity., Evaluation suggested it might be a local evaluation balloon., The sighting was documented as part of Project 10073.
witness description: the observer's name is not included, but the sighting was officially documented.
